sentence.Network_en: And why , my lady wisdom? Hold your tongue, good prudence ; smatter with your gossips, go.
sentence.Network_cn: 为什么不该!我的聪明的太太? 谁要你多嘴, 我的好大娘?你去跟你那些婆婆妈妈们谈天去吗, 去!

list.abs: People with a smattering of physics may bring up " quantum mechanical vacuum fluctuations ", 对物理学一知半解的人们可能会提出 " 量子力学真空涨落 "
